name: @vscode/tsconfig-gen
description: Tool to generate tsconfig files from a higher level description

scripts.all: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.all:publish: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run compile:publish && npm run lint
scripts.prepack: git clean -xfd . && npm install && npm run all
scripts.prepublishOnly: echo "⛔ Can only publish from a secure pipeline ⛔" && node ../build/npm/fail
